name: dataprism-core
description: High-performance browser-based analytics engine with WebAssembly and plugin system

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:dist: rm -rf dist cdn packages/*/dist apps/*/dist tools/*/dist
scripts.build:all: npm run build:tools && npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:core && npm run build:orchestration && npm run build:plugins
scripts.build:core: cd packages/core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg && npm run post-build:core
scripts.build:plugins: cd packages/plugins && npm run build && cd out-of-box && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:demo && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:release: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run build:cdn && npm run size-check
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:packages: npm run test:core && npm run test:orchestration && npm run test:plugins
scripts.test:plugins: cd packages/plugins && npm test && cd out-of-box && npm test
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:browser && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:rust && npm run lint:ts
scripts.format: npm run format:rust && npm run format:ts
scripts.size-check: npm run size-check:packages && npm run size-check:cdn
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run size-check
scripts.validate:security: npm audit --audit-level moderate && npm run audit:licenses
